text: Khanpur () is a city in Punjab, Pakistan. Khanpur is a centre for sugarcane and cotton crops. The Tehsil of Khanpur is one of the largest area-wise of Rahimyar Khan District. The famous Cholistan desert is mainly located in the Khanpur area. Khanpur is also known as Khanpur Katora; Katora means bowl. Khanpur had a long history of producing clay bowls. Khanpur is a nice and historical city of punjab, Pakistan. It is famous for the sweet named as khanpuri pedry famous in all over the pakistan Category:Tehsils of Punjab (Pakistan) Category:Rahim Yar Khan District
title: Khanpur Tehsil
